mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(username, nickname,password, email,profile_img, updated_at, created_at) VALUES(#{username}, #{nickname},#{password}, #{email}, #{profileImg}, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.post_thumnail, p.user_id, u.username, u.nickname, u. profile_img FROM post p INNER JOIN user u ON p.user_id=u.user_id WHERE p.user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY v.post_id DESC

SELECT p.post_id, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.post_thumnail, p.user_id, u.username, u.nickname, u. profile_img FROM post p INNER JOIN visit v ON p.post_id = v.post_id INNER JOIN user u ON v.user_id = u.user_id WHERE v.user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY v.post_id DESC

SELECT l.love_id, l.user_id, l.post_id, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.post_thumnail, p.user_id, u.nickname, u.profile_img, p.updated_at FROM (SELECT * FROM love WHERE user_id=#{userId}) l INNER JOIN post p ON l.post_id = p.post_id INNER JOIN user u ON p.user_id=u.user_id ORDER BY l.post_id DESC
